titles: The iudgement of the court of warre upon the charge laid against Sir Richard Cave, for the delivery up of Hereford Oxford, 26. Iunij. 1643.
author: Rupert, Prince, Count Palatine, 1619-1682.
publisher: y Leonard Lichfield, printer to the University,
notes: At end of document: Directed by the Councell of Warre to be printed and pubished, and especially to be sent to Hereford.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
